Articles.Content:
![kGD10Mc.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/kGD10Mc.jpg)

**MiG-31 Foxhound**

**Designer: Zekes**

**Status:****COMPLETED**

**Cost:** **$99,322.00** 

**The Big Brother of the MiG-25 - one of the fastest and heaviest armed interceptors in the world.**

**Max Speed is 1230m/s** **(NOTE: Heating should not be a problem, I recommend turning the heat UI off or the game crashes from it)**

**Max Altitude is 23,000m level flight**

**Press "4" for flaps toggle, "G" for gear.**

***Download:*** [http://www./download/fy...k/Mig-31.craft](http://www./download/fyddbn8wvg2a2xk/Mig-31.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T15:59:55Z" title="05/03/2015 03:59  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by zekes**
Stop! I'm now going to have no rep for you when the soviet pack comes out:mad:

![pOG5KbA.png](http://i.imgur.com/pOG5KbA.png)

Shadow one: you have your objectiveÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.commence operation
Nice! love the photo effects. You should try posting an album, maybe?

> 
> Nice! love the photo effects. You should try posting an album, maybe?

You mean of the plane, or of my photo effects?

> 
> You mean of the plane, or of my photo effects?

Or both? Nice plane btw.

> 
> You mean of the plane, or of my photo effects?

Of the plane. You know, how many G's it can pull, Jeb freaking out, max range, max flight time, etc. All of your crafts are good, but I can't get the info I want from your posts.

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/pOG5KbA.png](http://i.imgur.com/pOG5KbA.png)
> Shadow one: you have your objectiveÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.commence operation

Shadow one: We got you covered.

![dEFgfzF.png](http://i.imgur.com/dEFgfzF.png)

Cheesus Zekes, slow down or you'll spoil the whole pack xD
Wow guys. I think I stepped into a war...

> 
> Of the plane. You know, how many G's it can pull, Jeb freaking out, max range, max flight time, etc. All of your crafts are good, but I can't get the info I want from your posts.

Ah, I get it - I find normally i have so many craft I have to remove info from each post XD but I'm more than happy to give you more info.

 I think it pulls 15 Gs - not to many, as it's designed for high speed at altitude, not turning, although it is capable of making turns at 20,000m. Top speed is tested to 1230 - that means it sits there safely, without overheating. Not sure if it's capable of faster, but that's close to the limit. She uses 6 Engines to get to that speed- they're hidden in one another, and it looks good too. But that means anywhere below 15,000m you're going to be draining fuel out the back trying to go at any speed. The drop tanks feed first, so when they run out of fuel you can jettison them if you want - I normally keep them on (as no peacetime air force would drop tanks, they're expensive) but you can to increase range if you're close to empty. Normal fuel load is about 1623L, but it has a full capacity of 2098L if you want to really push it - but I have no idea the handling or performance at that full a fuel level.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/8AWJv)

Meanwhile, the Artwork album is also uploading - that will be on my Blog, it's 100 pictures so it's gonna take a while XD

And it's not a war, it's a soviet pack - and that's an epic plane, is that an A-50? I was thinking of making one of those ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) And the MiG is the last one I'll individually release.

> 
> Wow guys. I think I stepped into a war...

AHAHAHA ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Well, you sure did xD
Haha, I think it's just friendly rivalry.... and anyway stealth doesn't work in KSP....
Do vodka-powered afterburners come sold separately or are they part of the package?

> 
> Do vodka-powered afterburners come sold separately or are they part of the package?

In soviet russia, Afterburner throttles YOU!

> 
> Haha, I think it's just friendly rivalry.... and anyway stealth doesn't work in KSP....

Took you forever to notice it so yeah stealth

> 
> Took you forever to notice it so yeah stealth

Notice what? XD

> 
> Notice what? XD

Exactly!

I wish I could make another replica in KSP, but SAT Subject tests and my AP World AP Test beckon.

AP World will be a joy to study for. 8,000 years of human history crammed in one day.
Some time today I will pit your Mig against my F15. I'll post a vid once it is uploaded.

> 
> Some time today I will pit your Mig against my F15. I'll post a vid once it is uploaded.

sounds cool! I can't wait to see how it does....
